content: height of your bottle when your bottle is full the bag will stretch so keep the final round a little shorter to compensate keep trying your water bottle in the bag to ensure it fits whilst stretched once height has been achieved join with slip_stitch and then make a chain to your desired strap length being careful not to twist the chain join to the double_crochet on the opposite side with slip_stitch work a slip_stitch in the chain next to the double_crochet and ch1 turn your work and work a half_double_crochet in the back bump of each chain of your strap work a slip_stitch at the base of the chain and work single_crochet in each chain and double_crochet around the top of the bag until you reach the strap work a single_crochet in each stitch of the strap and each single_crochet along the top edge join to the base of the strap and fo reattach yarn on the unworked edge and do two row of single_crochet fo and weave in all ends tester photos
